description.narrative: Allocation of Funds to Mama Cash from CMI! 2021-2025

Mama Cash was the first international women’s fund in the world, and as of 2021, will be the only women’s fund that will fund feminist activists anywhere in the world on any topic. We mobilise resources to support feminist organisations, and foster partnerships and networks to defend and advance women’s, girls’, and trans and intersex people’s human rights globally. Mama Cash is the consortium lead and is based in Amsterdam.

mailing-address.narrative: Mama cash Eerste Helmersstraat 17-2HG, 1054 CX Amsterdam, Netherlands

sector.vocabulary-uri: We mobilise resources to support feminist organisations, and foster partnerships and networks to defend and advance women’s, girls’, and trans and intersex people’s human rights globally.
sector.narrative: CMI!’s vision is a gender equal and just world, where all women, girls, and non-binary, gender non-conforming, trans and intersex people enjoy their rights fully and live to their full potential.

policy-marker.narrative: CMI!’s vision is a gender equal and just world, where all women, girls, and non-binary, gender non-conforming, trans and intersex people enjoy their rights fully and live to their full potential.
